Html: I've installed the visx and can see the CSD extension installed when I look in visual studio, however, I cannot create a CSD project. I don't have the option. I've tried copying around the template, running as admin, etc. but the project template does not show.

I've never created a new CSD project (I always add CSD's to existing projects), so never noticed this issue. I will look into fixing it. For now, you can just create a new project (library, etc) and add the new CSDs. It pretty much does the same thing as the project template would.
